text: About the same as my syllabus

I remembered the days my class joker kena chased by the Chinese teacher with chalk duster.. lol she didn't catch him so she use the duster n wack all over his black bag. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚

I got bad memories with my chinese teacher  particularly sec 1/2
2nd time she chased him  he remembered to snatch his bag n run together. She was so angry  she told him to stop running n really drag him by his shirt n dust him all over
This one happen all the time. But luckily the guy wrote and throw to the girl I liked
Everyday chinese lesson i move my table and chair and sit outside the class

Another time my classmate asked by history teacher to kiss blackboard. He pretended to put near but he didn't really touch it. Then the history teacher slowly walked up to him  he didn't notice n she push his head towards the board. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
Those days teachers still can do such things. Now can not
Last time i use chem textbook to shield myself for physics lesson
Later the student go home cry lah or do TT say teacher abuse lah etc
The teacher said wa wa wa so power
But when it happened during our time  we really just laughed it off
I whole week forgot to bring physics textbook
One of the days kena caught
